channel.title: SalvationPK 718|24/7|Drygores!|Customs!|
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]SalvationPK 718 24/7[/B]![/SIZE][/CENTER]
[U][B]What this RSPS includes![/B][/U] -Fully Working Godwars! -Nex 100% Working! -Barrows 100% Working! -Stable Economy! -Active Pking! -Drygore Weapons! -Off-Hands! -Custom Armour/Rares! -Primal Weapons/Armour! -Fully Working Skills! -Great Community! -Amazing Staff! -New Training Teleports! -New Home! -New Slayer Teleports! -New PvM Teleports! -New Skilling Area at Home!
[B][U]What's going to be added?[/U][/B] -Fully working Dungeoneering -Better Donor/Extreme Donor Zones!
[CENTER][B]SCREENSHOTS[/B][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24pmkat.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2j4agxs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/315nbwk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zecpkp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2r40k5w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/280l6yx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/10h7k8y.png[/img]
[B][U]Why you should join![/U][/B] You should join because it is a friendly community that welcomes all players. All of your suggestions/feedback is taken into consideration and will more than likely be added to the server. There are many features of which you can choose from, you can either do skilling and get your levels up for that amazing max/completionist cape! or you can do bossing and take on the wrath of the bosses for amazing drops!
Client download link - [url=http://speedy.sh/XwAST/SalvationPK.jar]http://speedy.sh/XwAST/SalvationPK.jar[/url]
Forums link - [url=http://s13.zetaboards.com/SalvationPK/index/]http://s13.zetaboards.com/SalvationPK/index/[/url]
I hope to see you all in-game! Your feedback is welcome, please do not flame.
Owners are: Anthony & Fatality.
Credits: Me & Anthony 30% Rune-Evo 70%

[B][U]Why you should join![/U][/B]
